comments: very sweet lady. you can tell she really cares about her students. i also wish she taught more classes, def would\'ve taken her again if possible.

Her english isn\'t very good but she tried her best to get her point across. Was always willing to explain again and stay after with students. Let the class out early on most days. Brags too much about her french class.

I took her also for 101 and 102. If she was teaching another level, I would take her as well. She is very nice, very understanding and a great person. She makes things easy to understand and if you dont she does more than enough to help out her students. It\'s not just memorizing, we also speak the language in class which I love. MUST TAKE!

very understanding professor, always makes the whole class laugh. no papers, just a lot of quizzes. many packets to do but thats really much it. this class has a lot of memorization but its a lang course. i can tell she really cares for students. GREAT PROF!

i took her for french 101 and now taking her for french 102. she loves her students and makes french easy & interesting. she knows we have other classes so she isnt strict about deadlines but dont take advantage of her kindess because she will reflect it on your grade w/o warning but everyone seems to love her
